User Avatar ViewHelper.description: Renders the avatar for a specified backend user, including the `` tag. You can specify the user ID, the size of the avatar, and whether to display a default icon if no custom avatar is set.

Language Column ViewHelper.description: Accesses a specific column within a LanguageColumn object. Requires the column number and the LanguageColumn object as context to return the desired column.

Backend Module Link ViewHelper.description: Creates an internal link to a backend module. You can provide additional link arguments, include the current URL as a parameter, or use a query string for more complex linking.

Thumbnail Image ViewHelper.description: Generates an `` tag for rendering thumbnails. The ViewHelper supports various image parameters including width, height, cropping, and context. You can also pass additional attributes and data for customization.
